physical_appearance:\The image shows a digital print
 an artist\u0027s proof
 and a slide. They are rectangular in shape. The background of the digital print and artist\u0027s proof are blue in colour. The images depict two ladies and a horse. One of the lady is sitting on a horse with her helmet on
 while the other lady stands beside them with her helmet in her hands. The rest of the photograph is fragmented into rectangles
 as a result of horizontal and vertical black lines aligning to form a mesh pattern. The image at the bottom shows a slide. It is in colour. It is held in place by a frame. On the borders of the frame
 \\The Frame\\ is stated at the top for the image at the bottom. \\Tan Lip Seng

metadata.physical_appearance: "The image shows a digital print, an artist's proof, and a slide. They are rectangular in shape. The background of the digital print and artist's proof are blue in colour. The images depict two ladies and a horse. One of the lady is sitting on a horse with her helmet on, while the other lady stands beside them with her helmet in her hands. The rest of the photograph is fragmented into rectangles, as a result of horizontal and vertical black lines aligning to form a mesh pattern. The image at the bottom shows a slide. It is in colour. It is held in place by a frame. On the borders of the frame, ""The Frame"" is stated at the top for the image at the bottom. ""Tan Lip Seng
